short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time-saving enhancements to Percussion CM1. Tested up to v5.3 SR1.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NOTE: This extension is created and maintained by Dialogue Theory. Not endorsed by or affiliated with Percussion Software.

Features include:

Skip2Edit
Skips straight to edit page when you double click a page within Editor.

Save Scroll
Restores your scroll position after saving a page or template.

Also includes an options page to toggle features on and off individually (accessible from the icon, or from your Chrome Extensions list at chrome://extensions).

A NOTE ABOUT PERMISSIONS: Although Chrome will tell you it can access any website you visit, it's actually restricted to pages which match the URL structure of Percussion. We could not restrict it by domain because, aside from CM1 SaaS customers, Percussion installations are self-hosted, on a variety of different domains.
